name: Soccer Clubs
description:
◇Authorized by FIFPro◇
More than 60,000 real players' names and portrait rights, covering big-name players in top European leagues such as the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Ligue 1, and Eredivisie.

◇Create a wealthy family and fight against Qatar◇
The "Decisive Battle in Qatar" event is specially launched, allowing players to experience the world's top football matches at their fingertips, collect favorite national teams, build their own wealthy lineup, and fight Qatar.

◇Global ranking, real-time battle◇
The game has a global championship ranking upgrade method. You can compete with global players in the game, and you can also challenge the world's top giants in the game and get rich rewards.

◇Strive for hegemony in the business world, dominate the football field◇
Introducing the "National War" gameplay, the president of the league can compete for the position of the president of the three major football associations, engage in fierce city competitions, seize the league championship within a limited time, and reach the top of world football.

◇Story mode, become famous with one goal◇
The game's original plot gameplay, the story of Chinese teenagers bravely entering the European football world, allows you to experience the transformation from amateur to top in an immersive way, and you can also choose the direction of growth to create an international star who conquers the world.
developers: Beijing Crazy Sports Industry Management Co
